mapper.select: SELECT LPAD(TRUNC(AVG(SUBSTR(CMT_STR_TM, 1, 2) * 3600 + SUBSTR(CMT_STR_TM, 4, 2) * 60 + SUBSTR(CMT_STR_TM, 7, 2))/3600),2,'0') || ':' || LPAD(TRUNC(MOD(AVG(SUBSTR(CMT_STR_TM, 1, 2) * 3600 + SUBSTR(CMT_STR_TM, 4, 2) * 60 + SUBSTR(CMT_STR_TM, 7, 2)),3600)/60),2,'0') || ':' || LPAD(TRUNC(MOD(AVG(SUBSTR(CMT_STR_TM, 1, 2) * 3600 + SUBSTR(CMT_STR_TM, 4, 2) * 60 + SUBSTR(CMT_STR_TM, 7, 2)),60)),2,'0') CMT_STR_TM FROM CMT WHERE EMP_SQ IN (SELECT EMP_SQ FROM EMP WHERE DPT_SQ = #{dpt_sq}) AND CMT_DATE LIKE #{month}||'%'
